objects.name: Artifact
objects.description: In-game item that can be enhanced from Lv.1 to Lv.20, with main stats and sub-stats that affect player power.
objects.special_rules: Can have up to 2 sub-stats; sub-stats increase randomly during Enhancement Jumps at Lv.5, Lv.10, Lv.15, and Lv.20.

systems.name: Artifact Enhancement System
systems.description: A system allowing players to enhance Artifacts from Lv.1 to Lv.20 using Core Dust and Coins, with RNG-controlled sub-stat increases.
systems.mechanics: Players spend resources (Core Dust and Coins) to enhance Artifacts. Sub-stats increase randomly at specific levels (Lv.5, Lv.10, Lv.15, Lv.20). Overclock Bonus unlocks at Lv.20.
systems.objectives: Create a short-to-mid-term progression loop, maintain controlled RNG excitement, and ensure value for rare Artifacts.

logic_rules.summary: Sub-stat increases occur at specific levels.
logic_rules.description: At Lv.5, Lv.10, Lv.15, and Lv.20, Artifacts undergo Enhancement Jumps where sub-stats are added or increased randomly.
logic_rules.trigger: Reaching Lv.5, Lv.10, Lv.15, or Lv.20 during enhancement.
logic_rules.effect: Randomly adds a new sub-stat or increases an existing sub-stat.

logic_rules.summary: Overclock Bonus activates at Lv.20 based on rarity.
logic_rules.description: When an Artifact reaches Lv.20, it gains an Overclock Bonus tied to its rarity (Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
logic_rules.effect: Grants a bonus effect or stat boost depending on the Artifact's rarity.
logic_rules.source_note: Overclock Bonus section and Table Analysis (b13a42aa6a421d99b6f0deaad47c59ff6c92734e60ee23820cf472c008e3e861)

requirements.title: Short-to-Mid-Term Progression Loop
requirements.description: Ensure players experience a sense of progress through predictable resource expenditure paired with RNG-driven excitement.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Players should feel a consistent sense of advancement while being motivated by RNG outcomes.

requirements.title: Controlled RNG System
requirements.description: Implement RNG mechanics that maintain player engagement without frustration.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: 100% success rate for enhancements, with RNG applied only to sub-stat outcomes.

requirements.title: Non-Pay-to-Win Economy
requirements.description: Ensure all resources required for Artifact enhancement can be obtained through gameplay.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Core Dust and Coins must be earnable via PvE, PvP, and Daily Missions.
